Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: 07.10.2003
14.08.2012 SH SCR17405 (see SCR7114) Deleted program to convert result file to CSV (disabled sine 2004)
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
16.03.2006 JJ SCR10477 Selective showing of columns (0-par OXA400D
21.12.2004 JJ SCR7468 Added Conditional where clause handling
20.12.2004 JJ SCR7564 deletion of temp files GSET(73) based
26.11.2004 JJ SCR7383 changed handling header
24.11.2004 JJ fixed delete CSv result file (path) + added verifies per delete
09.11.2004 JJ SCR7156 Added delete of temp result file (QDLS\MAGICTD)
14.10.2004 JJ SCR7114 call convert to csv replaced by IOCOPY
23.09.2004 JJ SCR6203 cont. New OXA400D, bug fixes
21.09.2004 JJ SCR6203 Replaced QUSR handling by QDEF
This replaces support for starting of saved queries (was not used)
by support of multiple query definitions (based on DEBC or CLNT or ...)
30.08.2004 JJ SCR6917 fixed reading admn/clnt form header + criteria sequence no
28.07.2004 JJ SCR6656 cont, fixxed bug handlign xml input file
21.07.2004 JJ SCR6656 changed criteria handling to use keyword ID
Variation of OXA400B to handle user queries
Error codes
1 empty input file
2 no output file specified
3 failed to send mail
parsing errors XML
10000 * (sequence number of element) +
100 * element code +
(1 request, 2 header, 3 cusr, 4 session, 5 data, 6 column, 7 criteria)
Error codes
01 Invalid element count
50 + n Error in attribute n
XML element paths names
No forward/backslash in pi.InputFile get path from GNRD(26)
>>this means that files in subdirectories of GNRD(26) need full path
else convert
If nothing in input file set error
extract filename in case path + file is sent for Outputfile
For now we put the converted file in the XML requests path
mail result to recipient
If no errors sending mail.. delete temp files
Delay to ensure files have been released

ExpSyntax.val: IF (FileSize (Trim ({0,7})&Trim ({0,6}))=0,MlsTrans ('No results with the selected criteria'),'')

Text.val: Attribute fields
--(heller) user
-seq no
Index for XMLGET() of recurring elements
Element Counters
Return Values called programs
User defaults if not in request
Final checks
Error: Return lineno of filerow where error was encountered error code
(for error code multiply by 10000, leaving 1-9999 for identification)
Element counts
Request: error 101
Header: error 201
HUSR: error 301
Session: error 401
Data: error 501
Columns : error 601
Criteria: optional
21.09.2004 QusrID no longer represents saved user queries but query definition
Error : 451
Element counts OK: read request attributes
151 invalid Rq type
152 invalid Rq Date - of no real interest
153 invalid RqTime - of no real interest
No errors: proceed with handling of header
Proces Data
Process columns and criteria
For criteria we send the "screen labels" in the XML instead of the ID's
so we'll just have to link again
validation limited to existence check
sequence number = criteria count (current not total)
Set user mail. in case no recipient in data section
If administration and/or client number in request header add to criteria
Query not found,.. error
